survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from community members about their participation and satisfaction with the local recycling program to identify areas for improvement and increase recycling rates.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in the community recycling program?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure options are clear and cover all possible participation frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in the community recycling program?

questions.question_text: Which types of materials do you typically recycle? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected 'Always', 'Frequently', or 'Occasionally' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to capture common recyclables. Include an 'Other' option for completeness.

script.question_text: Which types of materials do you typically recycle? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected 'Always', 'Frequently', or 'Occasionally' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face when participating in the recycling program?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face when participating in the recycling program?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the convenience of the recycling drop-off locations?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected 'Always', 'Frequently', or 'Occasionally' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure options are clear and cover all satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the convenience of the recycling drop-off locations?
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected 'Always', 'Frequently', or 'Occasionally' in Q1.

questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected 'Always', 'Frequently', or 'Occasionally' in Q1.
